meanings.definition: A person who performs menial tasks or runs errands for someone else.
meanings.sent1: The flunky delivered the documents to the office.
meanings.sent2: The office manager assigned the flunky to make coffee for the team.
meanings.sent3: The flunky accidentally spilled coffee on the boss's shirt!
meanings.sent4: She felt like a flunky, always at the beck and call of her demanding boss.
meanings.sent5: The image of the flunky scurrying around with a stack of papers stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A person who is easily manipulated or controlled by others.
meanings.sent1: The flunky always agreed with whatever his boss said.
meanings.sent2: She realized she had been a flunky, blindly following her friend's advice.
meanings.sent3: The flunky nodded along to every ridiculous idea the group proposed.
meanings.sent4: He was tired of being a flunky, always doing what others wanted.
meanings.sent5: The flunky puppet danced on the strings of his manipulative boss.
